Uses of Class
com.opencredo.concursus.domain.events.binding.EventTypeBinding

  • Packages that use EventTypeBinding 
    Package Description
    com.opencredo.concursus.domain.events.binding
    Provides the concrete EventTypeBinding class, which captures the aggregate type and EventTypeMatcher for a group of events directed at the same aggregate type.
    com.opencredo.concursus.domain.events.history
    Provides the EventHistoryFetcher, which may be used to retrieve the event histories of one or more aggregates from an EventSource.
    com.opencredo.concursus.domain.events.state
    Defines the StateBuilder interface, which represents a class which can build an instance of a state class from an aggregate's event history, and the StateRepository interface, which represents a class that can retrieve state objects by aggregate id.
    com.opencredo.concursus.mapping.events.methods.reflection
